The main difference is that the entire string is a link now.

body:
Should have included screenies right away, apologies! 

I replaced the comma with a `–` so that there aren't two commas for a location in the form of `City, Country`.

The main difference is that the entire string is a link now. 

### Before
![users-show-before](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/164400/21741360/7be53da8-d4d3-11e6-8e3a-df6dbb138567.png)


---

### After

![users-show-after](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/164400/21741361/863ff8a6-d4d3-11e6-8694-d36ff9e30402.png)
